title: Curious sans serif - It's Nice That
content:
Hi there,

Would really appreciate an ID on this curious sans-serif taken from It's Nice That website.

Many thanks in advance!

Dan

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414004646im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bookshelf_5464.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [bookshelf.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414004646/http:/typophile.com/files/bookshelf.jpg) | 33.36 KB |
author: danbo

comments.content: Pretty convinced it's [Aperçu Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414004646/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/apercu/mono). May be artificially a bit emboldened?
